snippet.textDisplay: Unpopular opinion also, but I prefer Megaman 1 to both 2 and 3. Probably my favorite of the original 6.
snippet.textOriginal: Unpopular opinion also, but I prefer Megaman 1 to both 2 and 3. Probably my favorite of the original 6.

snippet.textDisplay:
@PsychicVortex Mega Man 9 is basically Megaman  1 and 2. 10 is basically Megaman 1 and 2 with 7's shop.

Mega Man 8 is a zoomed in 32bit Mega Man 7 with voice acting and bosses. It's mediocre, but it has the best intro in Japan as well as a catchy Boss intro (When they appear, not when they're selected) music.
snippet.textOriginal:
@PsychicVortex Mega Man 9 is basically Megaman  1 and 2. 10 is basically Megaman 1 and 2 with 7's shop.

Mega Man 8 is a zoomed in 32bit Mega Man 7 with voice acting and bosses. It's mediocre, but it has the best intro in Japan as well as a catchy Boss intro (When they appear, not when they're selected) music.
